name: SingletonIterator_removeTest
description: Unit tests for the remove functionality of the SingletonIterator class.

test_cases.name: testRemoveAllowed
test_cases.description: Tests that the remove operation is allowed and correctly removes the element from the iterator.

test_cases.name: testRemoveNotAllowed
test_cases.description: Tests that the remove operation throws UnsupportedOperationException when not allowed.

test_cases.name: testRemoveBeforeNext
test_cases.description: Tests that the remove operation throws IllegalStateException when called before next.

test_cases.name: testRemoveAfterReset
test_cases.description: Tests that the remove operation throws IllegalStateException after reset.

test_cases.name: testRemoveTwice
test_cases.description: Tests that the remove operation throws IllegalStateException when called twice.
